body.name: Shahoo Convertible Folding Futon Sofa Bed Sleeper Couch for Living Room Faux Leather Upholstered Loveseat w/Removable Armrests, Metal Legs, 2 Cup Holders, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 18 hrs 20 mins
features: 3 Adjustable Positions: The Futon Sofa Bed Perfect for any occasion, three backrest settings let you enjoy family Talk, watch a long-awaited sports event or movies, or lets you enjoy a peaceful night's sleep!
Seating for 2: With a weight capacity of up to 500lbs, this stylish futon sofa allows you to lounge in comfort while preventing your favourite drink with the cup holder in the middle!
Convertible Futon Sofa Bed: Convert from a sofa to a comfy bed in just a few seconds with the removable arm pillows and adjustable backrests for a cosy rest in your living room!
Thoughtful Design: This sofa bed is made of tufted faux leather and 4 chrome-plated metal legs for durability, with space to store cups and removable armrests for convenience!
Suitable for Small Spaces: this sofa bed dimensions: 65"(L) x 32"(W) x 14"(H) , taller people are recommended to use it with an Ottoman to extend the length of this sofa bed!
body.description: Shahoo Convertible Folding Futon Sofa Bed Sleeper Couch Q1: What's it made of? A1:Unlike cotton sofas, this sofa is upholstered in faux leather, which is delicate and soft to the touch and easy to clean, but not as warm as cotton sofas, so it is recommended to use it with cotton cushions. Q2: What are its dimensions? A2:The longest side of this sofa is 65", if you are taller than this, you will need to curl up when sleeping on it, which is a slight inconvenience, so we recommend that you use it with an ottoman. Q3: How much weight can it support? A3:It has been tested to have a load bearing capacity of around 500lbs and is perfectly capable of taking two people sitting on it. Q4: How can I use it? A4:Once installed, just use a little force to slowly straighten its backrest and lower the small table with cup holder in the centre, and he becomes a sofa for two people, on which you can sit and chat with your friends and enjoy your leisure time! Q5: Why can't I find the couch leg part or the cup holder part?? A5:You can look for them on the back of the sofa, some of the parts are in the back of the sofa.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Q1: What's it made of? A1:Unlike cotton sofas, this sofa is upholstered in faux leather, which is delicate and soft to the touch and easy to clean, but not as warm as cotton sofas, so it is recommended to use it with cotton cushions. Q2: What are its dimensions? A2:The longest side of this sofa is 65", if you are taller than this, you will need to curl up when sleeping on it, which is a slight inconvenience, so we recommend that you use it with an ottoman. Q3: How much weight can it support? A3:It has been tested to have a load bearing capacity of around 500lbs and is perfectly capable of taking two people sitting on it. Q4: How can I use it? A4:Once installed, just use a little force to slowly straighten its backrest and lower the small table with cup holder in the centre, and he becomes a sofa for two people, on which you can sit and chat with your friends and enjoy your leisure time! Q5: Why can't I find the couch leg part or the cup holder part? A5:Cup holders and pillow accessories in zippered compartment on seat bottom, unzip to remove them for installation.

Metal Legs Metal legs on the bottom provide ample support for the sofa bed, easily holds the weight of two people. Cup Holders Dual cup holder design is convenient for placing water cups, you can drink tea and chat with your family or friends. Armresets Leather pillow that can be used as a pillow while sleeping or as a cuddle pillow.
This sofa bed is filled with foam so it will be comfortable to sit on, but if you need to sleep on it, we recommend you to put another blanket on it, it will give you a more comfortable experience!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great couch! See below if cant find directions👍🙃
reviews.reviewText: It’s amazing, comfy, stylish for a game room or lounging space! It was easy to put together…once I found the directions. They were inside the bottom of the couch in the zippered pockets along with the pillows and the cup holder cushion. It’s all there but the first direction tells you to turn it upside down to put the legs on, but without the directions you wouldn’t know that. Thats my only complaint. Hope that helps if anyone like me couldn't figure out where the directions and other cushions were. Other than that it sits and lays well, I would still use my own pillow if laying here, but it’s not too bad just using the ones that come with it. It’s big enough for guys to feel comfortable in the seats (seat leg room is nice) and the cup holder cushion blends well plus it’s actually better quality for the entire item than I even thought. Highly recommend!👍just flip it over and unzip for instructions😅

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Lots of damage
reviews.reviewText: Pros:- detailed instruction- cute blue screws- straightforward to assemble- comfortable cushionCons:- where do I start- the left front foot screws do not tighten up so the foot wouldn't stay in place.- back left foot screw holes do not align. Meaning i can tighten one, but the other doesn't fit cause the holes on the futon itself is closer than the holes in the foot- the left back rest is flimsy. Doesn't stand right up like the right back rest.- the middle cupholder screw holes doesn't align with the holes in the back rest. I was only able to put one screw.I had so much hope for this futon. I'm so disappointed that it doesn't work the way it's supposed to be. Amazon offered to refund 30% and I can keep this, but I don't think that's justifiable with how much damages there are. They offer to replace with a new futon. I was gonna take this but upon seeing the damage in the cupholder part, I'd rather go get a different one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this for the guest bedroom. It was easy to assemble. I like that it had cup holders and a space to put snacks. It’s easy to at up as a bed or couch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I work from home and bought this to go in my home office. The price was right and aesthetically it looks better than most futons since I really didn't want my office to look like a college dorm but still wanted the ability to use it as a spare bedroom if necessary. Setup wasn't terrible. It's really small though. I'm 6'1", but even somebody who was 5'5" feet would hang off the edge while sleeping on this. When it's flipped into a couch it also feels really small. It would be completely uncomfortable if didn't have a bench in front of it to kick my feet up on. It is what it is, you get what you pay for. I'm not totally displeased with it but given the option over again I probably would have kept shopping for something else if I'd of taken into account how small it really is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Very, very, very small
reviews.reviewText: We ordered 2 of these futon for a room used by our 14 year son and his friends as we are "re-doing" our movies room. The futons arrived early and were fairly easy to assemble. The futons do look nice and seem well built the problem is they are extremely small.Although the seller does give measurements it is difficult to realize how tiny these are until you sit in them or see someone sitting in them. The futons would probable be fine if you had a play room for small children but they do not work for teen boys or adults.I would recommend that the seller include a photo of an average size person sitting on the futon in the description.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Make sure you look at the measurements. The couch looks nice and is a firm softness. It sits low and the back isn't high, so some people might not like that its not a normal size couch. Its great for a kids room or game room couch. because of its height I wouldn't recommend as a normal living room couch.Also when it arrived the put the instructions, pillows, and middle cup holders inside the couch. Just unzip and they should be in there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice but hard to assemble
reviews.reviewText: This couch is nice when it’s all put together. It’s comfortable but putting it together was hard took a while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to put together
reviews.reviewText: I liked that this product was easy to assemble. It's comfortable to sit on. Definitely not a bad to sleep all night and but comfortable otherwise. Love the cup holders. Got this for a game room.
